sentences.sContent: And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux.
sentences.sContent_eng: And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux.
sentences.sCn: 我试图领悟毕达哥拉斯所景仰的数字力量,它支配著此消彼长。

sentences.sContent: And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux.
sentences.sContent_eng: And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux.
sentences.sCn: 我试图领悟毕达哥拉斯所景仰的数字力量，它支配着此消彼涨。

sentences.sContent: I have wished to know why the stars shine.And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux. A little of this, but not much, I have achieved.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have wished to know why the stars shine.And I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux. A little of this, but not much, I have achieved.
sentences.sCn: 我怀着同样的激情去寻找知识，我曾渴望着理解人心，我曾渴望知道为何星星会闪烁，我还企图弄懂毕达哥拉斯所谓的用数字控制变化的力量，但在这方面，我只知道一点点。
